str2: When, at which time. From hos and te; at which too, i.e. When.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To open. From ana and oigo; to open up.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Second; with the article: in the second place, for the second time. As the compare of duo; second.
Probably strengthened from phrasso; a signet; by implication, the stamp impressed, literally or figuratively.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Second; with the article: in the second place, for the second time. As the compare of duo; second.
An animal, living creature. Neuter of a derivative of zao; a live thing, i.e. An animal.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Genitive Neuter Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Middle or Passive - 2nd Person Singular
